title: Carmen FreeFlow: ANPR/ALPR Engine & SDK
description: Carmen FreeFlow is a high-accuracy ANPR software designed for free-flow traffic systems. It captures license plate data in real-time, even in high-speed, multi-lane environments. Supporting over 150 countries, it’s ideal for tolling, traffic management, and smart city projects. With seamless integration, robust performance, and adaptability to complex conditions, Carmen FreeFlow ensures reliable and efficient traffic monitoring for modern infrastructure needs.
